tasks.label: Flash Master (j-link)
args: ((echo r & echo h & echo loadfile debug/${workspaceFolderBasename}.hex & echo q) > flash.jlink) && (JLink.exe -device STM32F334C8 -if SWD -speed 4000 -USB 661050098 -CommandFile flash.jlink -NoGui 1)

tasks.label: Flash Slave (j-link)
args: ((echo r & echo h & echo loadfile debug/${workspaceFolderBasename}.hex & echo q) > flash.jlink) && (JLink.exe -device STM32F334C8 -if SWD -speed 4000 -USB 661043112 -CommandFile flash.jlink -NoGui 1)

tasks.label: Flash Master & Slave (j-link)
args: ((echo device STM32F334C8 & echo si SWD & echo speed 4000 & echo r & echo h & echo loadfile debug/${workspaceFolderBasename}.hex & echo q) > flash.jlink) && (for %n in (661050098,661043112) do JLink.exe -USB %n -CommandFile flash.jlink -NoGui 1)
